job.title: Software Engineer - Machine Learning
job.description: pstrongThe CompanystrongppWe are an early stage company building the next generation digital shopping platform from the ground up Our vision is to create a highly differentiated and personalized experience for consumers that revolutionizes the way people shop We have an incredible team and venture investors Come join the funppbrppstrongGoal of JobstrongppYou will be responsible for applying AI machine learning and data mining techniques to build the next generation shopping experience You will be part of a team solving hard problems like personalization ranking search semantic understanding of text and image data and inferring style preferences We believe that the shopping experience can be fundamentally improved by using AI and you will be responsible for bringing this vision to lifeppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliDesign build train and test Machine Learning models to push state of the art forward in Computer Vision NLP Recommender SystemsliliWrite productionlevel code to convert your ML models into working pipelinesrealtime servingliliRun AB tests analyze results and make data driven decisions for various featuresliliPrototype and launch ideas to push the boundary on consumer shopping experienceliliBuild the underlying frameworks and pipelines to be able to apply machine learning to different problems across the productliulpbrppstrongExperience RequiredstrongpulliBS in Computer ScienceEngineering or related technical discipline with 4 years experience in AIMLdata mining MSPhd in Computer Science preferredliliFamiliarity with deep learning algorithms and frameworks like TensorFlow PyTorch Keras and various state of the art models like Resnet50 InceptionV3 BERT etcliliAccomplished coder with experience in PythonGo and comfortable working across the stackliliPassion to learn and invent the state of the art in computer visionliliPassion for applying AIML to real world problems You are interested in solving consumer problems endtoendliulpbrppstrongOur ValuesstrongpulliCritical thinking  we use judgement in making key decisions we are innovative and deep thinkers we are deliberate and produce high quality workliliHelpfulness and transparency  we support each other by providing context and feedback we operate with respect towards our customers partners and team we are open to giving and receiving feedback with the intention of improving how we functionliliOperate as an owner  we are deeply invested in the success of the company and its customers we do whats right not whats easy we spend carefully and know that any success is tied to what is best for our customersliliPronto  we operate with a sense of urgency have a GSD mentality we are open to change as business needs evolve and we embody grit and tenacityliul
